Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
For this faction's narrative style and in world references, please check the glossay delivered as part of the documentation.
In the lines below, {STR_LeaderName} is replaced by the name of the player's avatar.

In the lines below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Behold Creator’s bounteous formations all around you. Have you come to share your Essence, or do you seek some other boon?
We will gladly indulge you, friend of life, trusting that in a coming day we may savor your Essence.

May Creator bless you, Essence Keeper. You have come before the cursed and the rotten, the ones that were left forever forgotten. Our immortal bodies have witnessed much suffering, but our faith is unbroken. Will you join our prayers, {STR_LeaderName}, or end in consumption?
Are your peaceful ways due to wisdom or cowardice? We must discern your Essence. Are you willing to face the Agents of Entropy to gain Creator’s favor?
We sense Entropy’s corruption deep within you, {STR_LeaderName}. We judge you unworthy of your own Essence. It is time we preserved it within ourselves.

We welcome you as a visitor, friend of life {STR_LeaderName}. Although your faith remains unproven, Creator has gifted you with precious Essence. We trust that in serving you, we serve our beloved Creator.
Line upon line, precept upon precept; here and there, little by little, faith increases. Your Essence glows bright. We open our secrets to you.
Wrath is Entropy’s instrument . We seek to quash our hostilities. Repentance is proffered by Creator’s grace. Let us preserve our precious Essence and turn to forgiveness.
Your actions reek of Corruption, {STR_LeaderName}. This we cannot allow. Creator has decreed that our relations cannot continue like this. Your actions have weakened our diplomatic ties.
Why do you intrude upon our sacred spaces? Come. Share your Essence and tell us what you seek.
Even the unruliest life can be redeemed. We grant you this space in the hopes that you will someday share our faith.

May Creator watch you, Essence Taker. You have come before the cursed and the rotten, the ones that were left forever forgotten. Our immortal bodies have witnessed much suffering, but our faith is unbroken. Will you join our prayers, {STR_LeaderName}, or end in consumption?

We are delighted you seek to further strengthen our faith together. We require Essence. The world is full of those who squander it. To prove you are worthy to keep yours, do our bidding. We will guide you.

We judge you unworthy of your Essence. You are impertinent, and you heed Entropy’s seductive temptations rather than cherishing Creator’s commands. We are compelled to rescue your Essence and preserve it within ourselves.

What does the mighty {STR_LeaderName} seek here among our sacred tombs? Do you seek Creator’s will, or do you follow the enticing lure of Entropy and squander your precious Essence? You are free to ask of us whatever you wish. We will refrain from judging you.
{STR_LeaderName}, just as Creator causes seasons to change, we feel our relations changing. Little by little, weak things become strong.
{STR_LeaderName}, we weary of Entropy’s wrathful tongue. We seek Creator’s peace. If you will repent, we will grant forgiveness and end our conflict.
Your actions reek of Corruption, {STR_LeaderName}. This we cannot allow. Creator has decreed that our relations cannot continue like this. Your actions have weakened our diplomatic ties.
Blessed Creator guide your path. Have you come to this place to share your Essence?
Please, be our guests. We indulge you now that in a coming day we may savor your Essence.

May Creator be with you, Essence Bearer. You have come before the cursed and the rotten, the ones that were left forever forgotten. Our immortal bodies have witnessed much suffering, but our faith is unbroken. Will you join our prayers, {STR_LeaderName}, or end in consumption?
We remain low on Essence and cautious to trust strangers. If you wish to join us, prove your obedience. Help us.
{STR_LeaderName}, regrettably we find ourselves at war. Are you here to reject Entropy’s wayward path, or shall we take your Essence by force?
Hail {STR_LeaderName}! Your Essence intoxicates us. We welcome you to share your Essence with our kind. What seek you here?
{STR_LeaderName}, we sense Creator’s glory growing in you. As you shed the influences of Entropy, we offer you the support of our faith.
{STR_LeaderName}, we sense balance in your judgment. We withdraw our condemnation and offer you a path of forgiveness. Will you seek peace?
Your actions reek of Corruption, {STR_LeaderName}. This we cannot allow. Creator has decreed that our relations cannot continue like this. Your actions have weakened our diplomatic ties.
WE ARE PLEASED TO MEET AND SERVE THEE.
WE SEEK TO CHERISH THIS PLACE. MAY WE OFFER RECOMPENSE? {INT_Cost}[influence/]
WE SEEK THY FAVOR AND GUIDANCE. MAY WE SERVE THEE?
REGRETTABLY, WE MUST DISTANCE OURSELVES FROM THEE WITH WAR.
HOPING AGAINST HOPE, WE WOULD SPEAK WITH THEE.
OUR SERVICE TO THEE IS OFFERED FREELY.
WE APPEAL TO THY MERCIES. PLEASE SMITE OUR ENEMIES.
WHAT WONDERS MAY WE PURCHASE FROM THY EXALTED HALLS?
FOR NOW, WE OFFER OUR PROTECTION.
IT’S IN BOTH OF OUR BEST INTERESTS IF WE BUY THIS. {INT_Cost}[influence/]
WE WOULD PROVE OUR FAITH BY SERVING YOU.
HISTORY IS WRITTEN BY THE STRONG. SUBMIT OR DIE.
WE WILL ATTACK YOU IF YOU REFUSE TO ATTACK OTHERS.
WE ARE BUSY, BUT FOR NOW WILL DO YOUR BIDDING.
OUR ENEMIES ARE YOURS. DECLARE WAR ON THEM.
WHAT WILL YOU CONTRIBUTE TO OUR CAUSE IF WE TRADE?
WE WOULD OFFER OUR SERVICES TO EARN THY FAVOR.
WE WOULD PURCHASE THIS LOCATION FOR A FAIR PRICE. {INT_Cost}[influence/]
WE SEEK TO GAIN YOUR FAVOR. GIVE US A TASK.
YOUR PARASITIC WAYS ARE OFFENSIVE TO US. DIE.
THOUGH WE MAY DISAGREE, WE WOULD TALK WITH YOU.
WE SEEK A PATH OF SERVICE THAT GAINS YOUR FAVOR.
OUR RIVALS REQUIRE YOUR DIVINE INTERVENTION.
OPEN YOUR STORES TO US. WE WOULD DO BUSINESS.
Tread carefully, Friend of Life. Many have been enticed to follow the wayward wants of Entropy’s agents. We cannot abide schism.
We cherish life. We obey Creator's will. Tragically, we judge you an agent of Entropy. Until you repent, we must prevent you from squandering your life’s Essence.
Creator is patient. We are patient. You must be patient. We withhold judgment until you prove trustworthy or otherwise.
